identity.name: StreamVault
principles: Fusion: Streaming Utility x Cyberpunk Dashboard
Emotion: Anticipation (The feeling before a movie starts)
Density: High information density, low visual clutter
Depth: Layers of glass and light, not flat surfaces

headings.usage: All section headers, hero titles, modal titles. Use tracking-tight.

mono.usage: Stream URLs, technical metadata, error codes.

typography.installation: Import fonts via Google Fonts in index.css: @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Clash+Display:wght@500;600;700&family=DM+Sans:opsz,wght@9..40,400;500;700&family=JetBrains+Mono&display=swap');

public_browser.structure: Hero section with search (centered). Below, 'Featured Providers' in a bento grid. Below that, 'All Channels' in a virtualized list or dense grid.

admin_dashboard.structure: Sidebar navigation (collapsible). Main content area with 'Stat Cards' at top, 'Playlist Management' table below.
admin_dashboard.density: Compact. Use table views for playlists.

auth_page.structure: Left: 50% width with abstract 3D visual. Right: 50% width with minimal login form centered.

buttons.style: Sharp edges or small radius (rounded-md). High contrast.
buttons.primary: bg-primary text-white hover:bg-primary/90 shadow-neon transition-all duration-300

cards.style: Glassmorphic. No solid backgrounds if possible.
cards.base: bg-slate-900/50 backdrop-blur-md border border-white/5 hover:border-primary/50 transition-colors duration-300

inputs.style: Minimalist. Bottom border only OR deep filled.
inputs.base: bg-slate-950/50 border-white/10 focus:border-primary focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary/50 placeholder:text-slate-600

channel_list.interaction: Hover reveals 'Copy URL' and 'Open VLC' actions.

images.description: Abstract purple/pink neon streaks. Use for Auth page left side and Hero section background (with heavy overlay).
Black sand/noise. Use as a fixed 'mix-blend-overlay' opacity-20 layer over the entire app to kill digital flatness.
Green wavy pattern. Use for 'Active/Online' states or success modals.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text-slate-400 is legible on slate-950. Use text-slate-200 for important info.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALLATION: Install 'clsx' and 'tailwind-merge' for dynamic classes if not present.
2. SETUP: Update tailwind.config.js with the colors provided in 'tailwind_config_extension'.
3. GLOBAL CSS: Add the @import for fonts in index.css and set the body font-family to 'DM Sans'.

4. TEXTURE: Create a global <div className='fixed inset-0 pointer-events-none z-50 opacity-[0.03] mix-blend-overlay' style={{ backgroundImage: 'url(...)', backgroundSize: '200px' }} /> using the texture_overlay image.
5. LAYOUT: Build the 'Public Browser' first. It needs a massive Search Input (h-16 text-xl) in the center of the hero.
6. COMPONENTS: Customize Shadcn components. Remove 'rounded-xl' and replace with 'rounded-md' or 'rounded-none' for a sharper tech look.
7. MOCK DATA: When building the UI, mock the M3U8 data structure (Channel Name, Logo, Group, URL) to test the grid.
8. VLC INTEGRATION: For the 'Open in VLC' feature, use a simple `vlc://` protocol link.
9. DO NOT use gradients for text. Keep text solid white or gray for readability.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
